item.title: Fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom
item.description: Dear Amy, How can we know the will of the Lord? Let’s look again into the treasure trove which is Psalm 25. Who, then, are those who fear the LORD? He will instruct them in the ways he chooses (v12). The LORD confides in those who fear him; he makes his covenant known to them (v14). Tim Keller defines the fear of the Lord as this, in a sermon from Proverbs on the fear of the Lord being the beginning of wisdom.
